# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-106">이 문서에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형을 나열하고 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 감지할 때 검색하는 것을 보여 주며,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-108">키워드 및 체크 수표와 같은 증분 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-108">Corroborative evidence, like keywords and checksums, can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-110">중요한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-113">중요한 정보 유형이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-113">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="ab497-114">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-114">Data loss prevention policies</span></span>](data-loss-prevention-policies.md) 
- [<span data-ttu-id="ab497-115">민감도 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-115">Sensitivity labels</span></span>](sensitivity-labels.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="ab497-116">보존 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-116">Retention labels</span></span>](retention.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="ab497-117">커뮤니케이션 규정 준수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-117">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="ab497-118">자동 레이블 지정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-118">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-119">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-120">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-121">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-123">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-124">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-125">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-126">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-127">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-128">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-129">변형되지 않은: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-130">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-133">정책은 300자 이내의 근접성에 있는 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색된다고 중간 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-134">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-135">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-136">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-137">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-143">abarouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-143">abarouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-144">abaroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-144">abaroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-149">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-149">routing #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-150">라우팅 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-150">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-151">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-151">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-152">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-152">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-153">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-153">routing#</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-155">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-156">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-157">8자리 숫자(기간 유무)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-159">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-160">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-161">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-162">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-163">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-164">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-165">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-166">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-167">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-168">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-169">정규식은 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-170">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-176">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-176">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-177">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-177">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-182">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-183">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-184">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-186">계정 번호는 6-10자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-187">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-188">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-189">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-190">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-191">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-195">정규식은 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-197">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-199">정규식은 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-200">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-216">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-216">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-217">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-217">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-218">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-218">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-219">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-219">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-220">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-220">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-221">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-221">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-222">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-222">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-223">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-224">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-224">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-225">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-226">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-226">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-227">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-228">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-229">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-230">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-231">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-232">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-233">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-233">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-234">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-237">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-238">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-239">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-240">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-241">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-251">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-251">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-252">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-252">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-253">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-253">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-254">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-254">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-255">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-255">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-256">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-256">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-257">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-257">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-258">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-259">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-259">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-260">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-261">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-261">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-262">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-263">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-264">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-264">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-265">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-265">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-266">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-266">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-267">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-268">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-270">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-271">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-272">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-273">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-274">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-284">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-285">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-286">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-288">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-289">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-290">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-291">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-292">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-293">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-294">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-295">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-296">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-297">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-298">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-300">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-301">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-302">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-303">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-403">오스트레일리아 의료 계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-404">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-405">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-407">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-408">1자리 숫자가 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-408">1st digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-409">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-409">9th digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-410">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-410">10th digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-411">11자리 숫자(선택 사항)는 개별 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-411">11th digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-412">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-413">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-415">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-416">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-417">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-418">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-430">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-431">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-432">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-434">문자(대소문자 구분 안 하여 7자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-435">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-436">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-437">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-438">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-439">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-440">검색된 Keyword_passport Keyword_australia_passport_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-474">호주 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-475">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-476">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-478">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-479">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-480">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-481">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-482">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-483">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-484">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-485">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-487">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-488">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-489">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-490">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-502">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-503">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-504">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-505">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-506">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-507">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-510">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-511">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-512">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-639">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-640">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-641">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-642">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-643">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-644">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-645">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-646">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-647">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-648">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-649">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ab497-650">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-651">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-652">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-653">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-655">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-656">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-657">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-660">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-660">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-663">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-664">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-665">한 문자와 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-667">한 문자, 7자리 숫자 및 하나의 공백의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-668">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-669">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-670">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-671">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-672">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-674">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-675">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-676">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-677">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-678">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-679">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-680">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-701">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-701">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-702">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-702">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-703">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-703">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-704">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-704">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-705">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-705">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-706">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-706">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-707">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-707">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-708">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-708">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-709">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-709">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-710">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-710">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-711">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-711">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-712">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-712">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-713">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-713">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-714">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-714">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-715">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-716">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-742">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-742">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-743">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-744">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-744">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-745">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-746">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-746">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-747">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-747">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-748">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-748">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-749">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-749">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-750">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-750">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-751">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-751">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-752">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-753">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-754">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-755">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-755">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-756">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-756">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-757">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-757">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-758">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-758">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-759">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-782">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-782">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-783">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-783">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-784">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-784">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-785">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-785">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-786">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-786">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-787">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-787">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-788">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-788">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-789">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-790">11자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-790">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-791">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-791">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-792">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-792">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-793">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-793">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-794">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-794">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-795">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-795">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-796">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-796">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-797">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-797">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-798">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-798">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-799">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-799">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-800">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-800">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-801">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-801">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-802">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-802">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-803">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-804">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-806">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-807">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-807">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-808">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-808">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-809">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-810">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-812">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-812">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-813">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-813">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-814">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-814">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-815">austrian vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-815">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-816">vat no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-816">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-817">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-817">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-818">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-818">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-819">austrian vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-819">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-820">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-820">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-821">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-821">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-822">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-822">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-823">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-823">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-824">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-824">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-825">vat identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-825">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-826">atu number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-826">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-827">uid number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-827">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-828">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-828">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-829">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-830">문자열 "DocumentDb", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-830">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-831">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-831">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-832">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-832">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-833">3-200자 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-833">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-834">기호(>), 등호(=), 큰 물음표(") 또는 아포스트로피(')입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-834">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-835">소문자 또는 대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-835">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-836">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-836">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-837">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-838">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-838">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-839">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-840">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-841">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-841">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-842">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-842">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-843">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-843">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-844">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-844">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-845">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-845">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-846">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-846">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-847">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-847">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-848">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-848">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-849">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-849">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-850">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-850">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-851">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-851">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-852">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-852">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-853">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-853">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-854">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-854">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-855">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-855">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-856">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-856">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-857">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-857">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-858">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-859">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-859">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-860">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-860">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-861">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-861">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-862">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-862">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-863">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-863">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-864">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-864">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-865">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-865">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-866">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-866">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-867">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-867">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-868">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-868">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-869">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-869">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-870">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-870">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-871">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-871">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-872">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-872">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-873">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 모든 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-873">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-874">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-874">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-875">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-875">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-876">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-876">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-877">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-877">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-878">세미콜론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-878">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-879">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-879">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-880">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-881">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-881">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-883">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-883">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-884">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-884">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-885">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-885">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
