## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-900">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-900">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-901">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-902">문자열 "HostName" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("azure-devices" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-902">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-903">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-903">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-904">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-905">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-905">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-906">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-907">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-907">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-908">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-908">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-909">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-909">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-910">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-910">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-911">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-911">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-912">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-912">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-913">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-913">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-914">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-914">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-915">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-915">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-916">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-916">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-917">소문자 또는 대문자 43자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-917">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-918">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-918">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-919">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-920">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-920">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-921">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-922">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-922">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-923">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-923">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-924">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-924">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-939">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-939">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-940">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-941">"userpwd=" 문자열 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-941">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-942">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-942">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-943">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-943">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-944">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-944">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-946">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-946">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-948">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-949">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-949">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-950">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-950">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-951">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-951">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-966">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-966">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-967">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-968">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-968">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-969">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-969">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-970">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-970">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-971">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-971">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-972">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-972">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-973">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-973">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-974">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-974">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-975">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-975">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-976">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-976">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-977">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-977">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-978">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-978">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-979">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-979">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-980">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-981">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-981">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-984">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-984">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-985">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-985">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-986">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-986">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-987">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-987">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-988">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-988">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-989">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-989">contoso</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1000">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1000">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1001">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1002">문자열 "sig", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1002">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1003">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1004">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1004">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1005">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1005">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1006">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1006">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1007">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1007">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1008">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1008">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1009">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1009">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1010">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1010">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1011">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1011">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1012">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1012">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1013">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1013">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1014">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1014">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1015">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1015">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1016">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1016">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1017">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1018">문자열 "EndPoint" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("servicebus.windows" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1018">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1019">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1019">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1020">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1020">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1021">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1021">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1022">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1022">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1023">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1023">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1024">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1024">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1025">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1025">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1026">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1026">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1027">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1027">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1028">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1028">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1029">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1029">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1030">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1030">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1031">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1031">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1032">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1032">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1033">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1033">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1034">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1034">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1035">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1036">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1036">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1037">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1038">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1038">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1039">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1039">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1040">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1040">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1055">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1055">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1056">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1056">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1057">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열 다음에 문자열 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1057">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1058">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1058">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1059">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1059">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1060">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1061">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1061">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1062">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1062">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1063">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1063">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1064">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1064">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1065">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1066">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1066">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1067">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1067">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1068">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1068">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1069">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1069">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1070">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1071">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1071">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1072">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1073">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1073">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1074">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1074">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1075">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1075">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1076">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1077">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1077">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1079">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1079">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1081">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1081">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1082">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1082">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1083">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1083">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1084">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1084">fabrikam</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1094">Azure 저장소 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1094">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1095">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1096">아래 패턴에 설명된 86개 소문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1096">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1097">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1097">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1098">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따오기 기호(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1098">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1099">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1099">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1100">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1100">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1101">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1102">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1102">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1103">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1104">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1105">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1105">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1106">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1106">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1108">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1108">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1110">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1110">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1111">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1112">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1113">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1114">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1115">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1115">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1116">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1116">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1249">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1249">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1250">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1251">11자리 숫자와 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1251">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1252">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1253">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1253">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1254">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 두 개의 선택적 기간 MM.DD 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1254">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1255">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1255">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1256">3개의 일차 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1256">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1257">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1257">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1258">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1258">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1259">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1260">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1260">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1261">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1262">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1262">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1263">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1263">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1264">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1264">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1265">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1265">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1266">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1266">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1267">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1267">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1268">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1327">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1327">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1328">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1329">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 문자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1329">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1330">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1331">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1331">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1332">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1333">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1333">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1334">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1335">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1335">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1336">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1336">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1337">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1337">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1338">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 찾거나 찾을 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 수 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1338">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1339">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1339">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1340">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1340">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1341">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1365">벨기에 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1365">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1366">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1367">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1368">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1369">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1370">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1371">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1372">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1373">12자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1373">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1374">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1375">12자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1375">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1376">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1376">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1377">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1377">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1378">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1378">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1379">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1379">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1380">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1380">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1381">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1381">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1382">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1382">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1383">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1383">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1384">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1385">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1385">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1387">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1387">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1388">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1388">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1389">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1389">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1390">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1390">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1391">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1391">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1393">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1393">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1403">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1403">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1404">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1405">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1405">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1407">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1407">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1408">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1408">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1409">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1409">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1410">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1410">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1411">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1411">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1412">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1412">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1413">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1414">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1414">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1415">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1415">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1416">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1416">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1417">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1418">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1420">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1421">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1421">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1422">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1422">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1423">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1423">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1424">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1425">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1425">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1426">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1426">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1427">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1428">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1428">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1429">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1429">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1430">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1430">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1431">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1431">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1432">수익</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1432">Revenue</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1438">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1438">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1439">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1440">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1440">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1441">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1442">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1442">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1443">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1443">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1444">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1444">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1445">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1445">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1446">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1446">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1447">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1447">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1448">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1448">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1449">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1449">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1450">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1450">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1451">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1451">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1452">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1453">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1455">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1456">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1456">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1457">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1457">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1458">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1458">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1459">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1459">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1460">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1460">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1461">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1461">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1483">브라질 국가 ID 카드(RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1483">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1484">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1485">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1485">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1486">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1486">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1488">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1488">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1489">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1489">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1490">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1490">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1491">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1492">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1492">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1493">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1493">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1494">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1494">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1495">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1495">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1496">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1496">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1497">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1497">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1498">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1498">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1499">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1499">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1500">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1501">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1501">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1503">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1503">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1504">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1504">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1505">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1505">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1506">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1506">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1511">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1511">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1512">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1512">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1513">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1513">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1516">RIC(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1516">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1517">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1517">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1518">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1519">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1519">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1520">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1521">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1521">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1522">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1523">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1525">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1526">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1526">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1527">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1527">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1654">불가리아 uniform의 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1654">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1655">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1656">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1657">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1658">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1659">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1660">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1661">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1662">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1662">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1664">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1664">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1665">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1665">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1666">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1666">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1667">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 1자리 숫자와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1667">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1668">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1668">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1669">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1670">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1670">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1672">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1672">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1673">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1673">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1674">키워드가  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1674">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1675">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1676">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1676">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1721">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1721">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1722">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1723">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1723">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1725">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1725">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1726">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1727">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1728">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1729">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1730">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1730">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1731">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1732">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1732">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1733">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1734">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1734">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1735">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1755">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1755">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1756">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1757">7자리 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1757">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1759">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7자리 또는 12자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1759">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1760">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1760">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1761">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1761">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1762">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1762">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1763">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1763">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1764">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1764">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1765">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1765">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1766">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1767">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1767">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-1768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1769">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1770">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1770">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1771">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1771">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1772">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1772">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-1773">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1773">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1774">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1774">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-1775">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-1775">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```
