#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4860">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4860">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4861">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4861">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4864">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4864">tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4867">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4867">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4868">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4868">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4869">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4869">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4871">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4871">taxidnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4875">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4875">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4876">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4876">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4877">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4877">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4878">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4878">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4879">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4879">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4880">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4880">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4881">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4881">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4882">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4882">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4883">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4883">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4884">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4884">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4885">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4886">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4886">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4887">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4888">13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4888">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4889">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4889">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4890">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4890">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4891">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4891">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4892">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4892">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4893">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4893">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4894">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4894">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4895">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4895">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4896">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4896">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4897">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4897">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4898">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4899">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4899">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4900">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4901">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4901">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4902">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4902">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4903">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4903">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4904">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4904">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4905">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4905">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4918">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4918">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4919">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4920">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4921">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4922">11자리 숫자 및 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4922">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4924">11자리 숫자 및 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 됨):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4924">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4925">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4925">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4926">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4926">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4927">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4927">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4928">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4928">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4929">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4929">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4930">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-4932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-4933">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4934">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4934">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4935">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4935">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-4936">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-4936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5085">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5085">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5086">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5087">2010년 11월 1일 이후: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5087">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5088">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5088">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5089">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5090">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5090">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5091">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5091">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5092">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5092">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5093">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5093">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5094">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5094">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5095">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5096">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5096">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5097">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5098">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5099">정규식은 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5099">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5100">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5100">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5101">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5101">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5102">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5102">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5103">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5103">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5104">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5104">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5105">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5105">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5106">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5106">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5107">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5107">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5108">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5108">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5109">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5109">identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5114">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5114">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5115">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5115">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5116">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5116">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5117">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5117">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5118">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5119">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5119">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5120">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5121">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5121">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5122">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5122">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5123">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5123">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5124">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5124">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5125">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5125">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5126">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5127">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5128">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5129">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5129">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5130">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5130">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5131">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5131">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5132">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5133">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5133">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5134">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5134">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5135">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5135">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5137">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5137">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5138">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5138">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5139">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5139">reisepasse</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5159">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5159">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5160">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5161">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5161">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5162">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5163">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5163">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5164">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5164">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5165">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5165">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5166">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5166">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5167">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5167">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5168">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5168">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5169">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5169">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5170">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5170">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5171">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5171">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5172">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5173">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5173">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5175">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5176">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5176">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5177">키워드가  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5177">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5178">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5178">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5179">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5179">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5205">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5205">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5206">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5206">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5207">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5207">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5208">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5208">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5209">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5209">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5210">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5210">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5211">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5211">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5212">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5213">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5213">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5214">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5215">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5215">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5216">D 또는 d 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5216">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5217">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5217">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5218">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5218">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5219">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5220">선택적 공백 또는 콤마</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5220">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5221">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5221">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5222">선택적 공백 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5222">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5223">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5223">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5224">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5225">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5225">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5226">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5227">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5228">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5228">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5229">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5229">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5230">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5230">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5231">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5231">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5241">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5241">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5242">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5242">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5243">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5244">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5244">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5245">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5246">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5246">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5250">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5251">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5251">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5252">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5378">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5378">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5379">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5380">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5380">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5381">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5382">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5382">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5383">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5383">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5384">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5384">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5385">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5385">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5386">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5386">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5387">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5387">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5388">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5388">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5389">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5389">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5390">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5391">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5391">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5392">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5393">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5394">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5394">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5395">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5395">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5396">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5396">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5397">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5397">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5398">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5400">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5400">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5401">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5401">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5402">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5402">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5403">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5403">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5404">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5404">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5405">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5405">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5406">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5406">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5407">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5407">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5408">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5408">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5409">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5410">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5410">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5411">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5412">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5412">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5413">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5414">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5414">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5416">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5417">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5417">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5418">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5419">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5419">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5420">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5421">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5421">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5422">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5422">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5432">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5432">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5433">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5433">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5434">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5434">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5435">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5435">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5436">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5436">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5437">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5437">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5438">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5438">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5439">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5439">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5440">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5440">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5441">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5441">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5442">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5442">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5443">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5443">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5444">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5444">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5445">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5445">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5446">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5447">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5447">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5448">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5449">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5449">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5450">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5450">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5451">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5451">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5452">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5453">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5453">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5455">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5456">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5456">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5457">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5457">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5458">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5458">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5459">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5459">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5462">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5462">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5464">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5464">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5465">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5465">socialsecurityno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5469">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5469">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5470">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5470">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5471">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5471">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5472">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5472">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5473">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5473">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5474">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5474">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5475">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5475">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5476">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5476">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5477">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5478">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5478">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5480">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5480">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5481">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5482">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5484">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5484">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5485">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5485">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5486">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5486">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5515">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5515">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5516">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5517">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5517">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5518">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5519">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5519">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5520">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5520">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5521">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5521">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5522">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5522">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5523">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5524">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5525">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5526">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5527">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5527">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5528">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5528">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5529">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5530">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5530">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5531">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5531">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5532">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5532">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5572">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5572">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5573">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5574">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5574">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5575">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5576">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5576">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5577">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5577">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5578">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5578">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5579">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5580">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5580">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5581">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5582">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5582">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5583">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5583">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5584">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5584">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5714">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5715">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5716">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5717">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5717">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5719">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5719">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5720">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 여성, 2-여성, 기타 번호는 1900년 이전의 시민 또는 이중 시민권이 있는 시민도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5720">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5721">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5721">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5722">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5722">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5723">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5723">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5724">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5724">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5725">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5725">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5726">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5726">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5727">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5727">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5728">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5728">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5729">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5729">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5730">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5730">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5731">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5731">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5733">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5733">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5734">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5734">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5735">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5735">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5736">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5736">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5737">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5737">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5738">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5738">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5739">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5739">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5741">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5741">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5742">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5742">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5743">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5744">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5744">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5745">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5746">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5746">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5747">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5748">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5748">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5749">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5750">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5750">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5751">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5751">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5752">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5752">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5753">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5753">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5754">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5755">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5755">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5756">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5756">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5769">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5769">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5770">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5770">útlevél száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5771">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5771">Útlevelek száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5773">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5773">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5774">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5775">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5775">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5776">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5777">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5777">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5778">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5779">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5779">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5780">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5781">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5782">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5782">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5783">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5783">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5784">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5785">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5785">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5805">헝가리 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5805">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5806">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5807">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5808">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5809">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5810">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5811">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5812">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5813">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5813">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5814">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5815">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5815">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5816">"8"을 입력해야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5816">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5817">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5817">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5818">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5818">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5819">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5819">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5820">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5820">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5821">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5821">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5822">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5822">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5823">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5823">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5824">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5824">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5825">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5825">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5826">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5826">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
