## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5852">헝가리 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5852">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5853">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5853">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5854">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5854">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5855">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5855">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5856">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5856">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5857">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5857">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5858">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5858">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5859">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5860">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5860">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5862">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5862">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5863">두 글자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5863">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5864">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5864">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5865">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5865">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5866">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5869">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5869">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5870">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5870">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5871">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5871">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5872">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5872">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5873">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5873">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5874">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5876">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5876">vat</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5878">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5878">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5879">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5879">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5880">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5880">hungarianvatno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5882">부가가치세 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5882">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5883">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5883">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5884">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5884">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5885">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5885">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5886">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5886">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5887">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5887">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5888">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5889">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5889">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5890">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5891">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5891">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5892">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5892">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5893">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 림)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5893">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5894">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5894">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5895">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5895">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5896">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5896">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5897">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5898">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5898">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5899">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5900">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5900">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5901">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5901">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5902">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5902">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5903">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5903">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5904">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5904">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5905">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5907">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5907">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5908">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5908">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5909">인도 고유 ID(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5909">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5910">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5911">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5911">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5912">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5913">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5913">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5914">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5914">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5915">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5915">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5916">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5916">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5917">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5917">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5918">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5918">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5919">검사 숫자인 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5919">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5920">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5921">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5923">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5924">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5924">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5925">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5925">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5926">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5926">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5927">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5927">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5928">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5928">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5929">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5929">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5930">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5930">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5931">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5931">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5932">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5932">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5933">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5933">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5934">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5934">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5935">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5935">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5936">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5936">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5937">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5937">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5938">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5938">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5939">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5940">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5940">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5941">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5942">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5942">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5943">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5943">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5944">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5944">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5945">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5945">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5946">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5946">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5947">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5947">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5948">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5948">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5949">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5949">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5950">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5950">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5951">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5952">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5953">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5954">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5954">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5955">정규식은 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5955">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5956">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5956">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5957">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5957">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5958">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5958">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5959">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5959">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5960">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5960">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5961">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5961">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5962">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5962">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5963">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5964">국가 코드(2자) 및 체크 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5964">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5965">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5966">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5967">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5967">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5968">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5968">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5969">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5969">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5970">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5970">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5971">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5971">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5972">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5972">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5974">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5975">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5975">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5977">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5978">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5978">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5979">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5979">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5980">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5980">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5981">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5981">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5982">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5982">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5983">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5984">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5984">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5986">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5986">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5987">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5988">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5988">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5989">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5990">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5991">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5991">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5992">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5992">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5993">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5994">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-5995">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5995">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5996">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5997">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-5998">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5998">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-5999">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-5999">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6000">국제질병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6000">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6001">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6002">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6002">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6004">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6004">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6005">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6006">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6007">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6008">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6008">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6009">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6009">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6010">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6010">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6011">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6011">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6012">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6012">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6013">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6013">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6014">국제질병 분류Dictionary_icd_9_updated 9번째 수정, [ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6014">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6015">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6015">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6016">[ICD-9-CM(ICD-9-CM)의](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)국제 분류인 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6016">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6017">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6017">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6018">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6018">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6019">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6019">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6020">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6020">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6021">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는(기간) 및 서식 없는(기간 없음) 버전을 계정하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6021">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6022">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6022">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6023">서식이 지정된 IPv6 번호(콜론 포함)를 계정하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6023">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6024">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6024">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6025">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6026">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6027">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6028">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 경우 높은 신뢰도로 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6028">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6029">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6029">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6030">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6030">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6031">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6031">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6032">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6032">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6033">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6033">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6034">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6034">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6035">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6035">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6036">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6036">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6037">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6037">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6039">IP(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6039">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6040">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6040">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6041">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6041">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6042">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6042">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6044">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6044">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6045">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6046">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6046">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6047">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6048">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6048">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6049">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6049">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6050">4개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6050">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6051">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6052">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6052">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6053">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6054">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6055">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6055">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6056">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6180">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6180">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6181">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6182">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6182">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6183">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6184">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6184">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6185">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6185">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6186">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6186">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6187">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6187">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6188">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6188">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6189">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6189">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6190">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6190">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6191">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6191">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6192">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6192">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6193">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6193">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6194">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6194">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6195">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6195">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6196">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6196">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6220">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6220">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6221">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6222">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6222">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6223">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6223">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6224">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6224">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6225">7자리 숫자와 2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6225">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6227">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6227">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6228">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6228">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6229">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6229">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6230">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6230">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6231">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6231">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6232">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6232">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6233">범위 A-I 또는 "W"의 선택적 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6233">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6234">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6237">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6238">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6238">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6239">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6239">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6240">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6240">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6241">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6241">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6242">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6242">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6243">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6288">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6288">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6289">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6290">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6290">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6292">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6292">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6293">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6293">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6294">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6294">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6295">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6295">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6296">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6296">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6297">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6297">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6298">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6298">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6299">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6299">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6300">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6301">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6302">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6303">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6303">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6304">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6304">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6305">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6305">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6306">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6306">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6307">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6307">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6308">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6308">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6309">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6309">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6310">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6310">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6311">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6311">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6312">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6312">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6313">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6314">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6314">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6315">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6316">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6316">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6317">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6318">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6319">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6320">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6321">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6321">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6322">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6322">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6323">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6323">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6342">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6342">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6343">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6343">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6344">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6345">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6345">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6346">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6347">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6347">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6348">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6348">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6349">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6349">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6350">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6350">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6351">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6351">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6352">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6353">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6354">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6355">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6356">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6356">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6357">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6357">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6358">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6358">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6362">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6362">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6363">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6363">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6364">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6364">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6365">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6365">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6366">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6367">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6368">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6369">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6370">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6371">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6372">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6373">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6373">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6374">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6375">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6375">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6376">패밀리 이름에 있는 처음 세 자위에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6376">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6377">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자국어에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6377">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6378">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6378">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6379">생년월일의 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6379">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6380">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6380">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6381">사람이 태어났던 시정구와 관련한 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6381">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6382">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6382">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6383">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6384">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6384">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6385">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6386">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6387">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6387">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6388">키워드가  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6388">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6389">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6389">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6390">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6390">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6425">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6425">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6426">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6427">2개의 문자 또는 숫자 다음에 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6427">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6428">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6429">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6429">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6430">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6430">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6431">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6431">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6432">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6433">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6433">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6435">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6435">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6436">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6436">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6437">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6438">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6438">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6439">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6440">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6440">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6441">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6465">이탈리아 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6465">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6466">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6466">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6467">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6467">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6468">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6468">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6469">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6469">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6470">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6470">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6471">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6471">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6472">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6473">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6473">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6474">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6475">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6475">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6476">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6476">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6477">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6477">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6478">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6478">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6479">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6479">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6480">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6481">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6481">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6482">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6483">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6483">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6484">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6484">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6485">검색된 키워드가 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6485">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6486">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6487">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6487">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6488">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6488">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6489">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6489">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6493">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6493">iva</span></span>
