## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6495">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6495">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6496">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6497">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6497">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6498">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6499">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6499">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6500">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6500">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6501">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6501">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6502">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6502">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6503">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6503">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6504">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6504">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6505">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6506">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6506">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6507">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6508">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6508">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6509">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6509">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6510">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6510">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6511">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6511">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6512">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6512">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6513">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6513">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6514">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6514">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6515">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6515">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6516">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6516">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6563">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6563">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6564">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6565">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6565">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6566">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6567">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6567">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6568">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6569">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6569">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6571">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6571">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6572">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6572">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6573">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6573">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6611">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6611">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6612">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6612">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6613">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6613">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6614">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6614">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6615">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6615">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6616">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6616">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6617">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6617">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6618">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6619">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6619">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6620">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6621">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6621">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6622">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6622">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6623">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6623">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6624">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6625">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6625">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6627">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6627">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6628">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6628">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6629">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6629">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6630">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6630">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6631">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6631">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6632">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6632">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6633">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6633">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6634">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6634">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6635">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6635">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6636">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6636">共通番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6644">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6644">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6645">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6645">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6646">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6646">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6647">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6647">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6648">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6648">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6649">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6649">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6650">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6650">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6651">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6652">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6652">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6653">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6654">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6654">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6655">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6655">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6656">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6656">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6657">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6657">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6658">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6658">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6659">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6659">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6660">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6661">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6661">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6662">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6663">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6663">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6664">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6664">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6665">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6665">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6666">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6666">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6667">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6667">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6668">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6668">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6669">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6669">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6670">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6670">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6671">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6671">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6672">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6672">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6673">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6673">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6674">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6674">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6675">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6675">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6676">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6676">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6677">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6677">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6678">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6678">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6679">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6679">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6680">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6680">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6681">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6682">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6682">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6683">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6684">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6684">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6685">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6686">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6686">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6688">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6689">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6689">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6690">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6690">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6692">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6692">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6695">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6695">Passport No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6699">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6699">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6700">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6700">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6701">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6701">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6702">೺೺固</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6702">パスポートNo.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6705">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6705">旅券番号♯</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6707">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6707">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6708">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6709">12개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6709">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6710">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6711">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6711">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6712">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6712">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6713">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6713">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6714">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6714">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6715">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6716">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6718">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6719">정규식은 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6719">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6720">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6720">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6721">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6721">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6722">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6722">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6723">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6723">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6724">거주 카드 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6724">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6725">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6725">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6726">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6726">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6727">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6727">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6728">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6728">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6729">일본 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6729">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6730">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6731">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6731">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6733">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6733">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6734">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6735">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6735">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6737">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6737">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6738">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6738">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6739">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6739">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6752">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6752">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6753">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6754">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6754">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6755">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6756">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6756">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6757">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6757">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6758">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6758">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6759">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6759">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6760">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6760">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6761">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6762">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6764">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6765">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6765">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6766">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6766">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6767">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6768">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6768">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6769">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6769">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6790">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6790">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6791">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6792">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6792">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6793">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6794">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6794">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6795">3개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6795">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6796">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6796">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6797">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6798">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6798">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6800">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6800">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6801">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6801">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6802">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6802">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6927">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6927">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6928">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6929">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6929">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6930">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6931">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6931">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6932">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6932">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6933">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6933">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6934">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6934">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6935">생년월일 세기(19 세기의 경우 "0", 20년의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6935">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6936">4자리 숫자(임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6936">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6937">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6937">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6938">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6938">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6939">2자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6939">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6940">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6940">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6941">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6941">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6942">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6942">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-6943">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6943">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6944">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6944">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6945">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6945">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6946">키워드가  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6946">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-6947">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6947">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-6948">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-6948">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7011">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7011">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7012">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7012">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7013">2개의 문자 또는 숫자 다음에 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7013">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7014">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7014">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7015">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7015">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7016">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7016">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7017">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7017">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7018">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7019">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7019">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7020">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7021">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7021">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7022">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7022">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7023">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7023">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7024">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7024">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7025">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7026">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7026">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7027">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7050">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7050">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7051">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7052">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7052">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7053">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7054">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7054">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7055">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7056">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7056">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7057">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7058">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7058">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7059">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7059">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7060">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7060">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7184">vairuotojo pažymėjimo 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7184">vairuotojo pažymėjimo numeriai</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7185">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7185">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7186">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7186">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7187">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7187">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7188">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7188">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7189">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7189">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7190">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7190">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7191">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7191">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7192">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7193">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7193">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7194">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7195">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7195">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7196">생년월일과 성별에 해당하는 1-6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7196">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7197">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7197">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7198">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7198">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7199">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7199">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7201">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7201">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7203">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7204">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7204">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7205">키워드가  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7205">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7206">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7206">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7207">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7207">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7242">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7242">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7243">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7244">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7244">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7245">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7246">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7246">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7248">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7248">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7250">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7250">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7251">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7251">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7252">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7253">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7253">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7254">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7254">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7255">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7255">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7256">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7276">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7276">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7277">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7277">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7278">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7278">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7279">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7279">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7280">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7280">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7281">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7282">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7282">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7284">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7285">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7285">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7286">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7286">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7410">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7410">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7411">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7411">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7412">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7412">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7413">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7413">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7414">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7414">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7415">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7415">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7416">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7416">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7417">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7418">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7418">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7420">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7420">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7421">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7421">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7422">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7422">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7423">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7424">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7424">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7426">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7427">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7427">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7428">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7428">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7429">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7430">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7430">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7453">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7453">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7454">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7455">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7455">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7456">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7457">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7457">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7458">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7459">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7459">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7460">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7461">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7462">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7462">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7463">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7463">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7464">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7464">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7465">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7466">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7466">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7467">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7467">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7499">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7500">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7500">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7501">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7501">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7502">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7503">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7503">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7504">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7504">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7505">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7505">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7506">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7507">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7507">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7508">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7508">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7509">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7509">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7510">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7510">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7511">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7511">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7512">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7513">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7513">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7515">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7516">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7517">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7518">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7519">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7559">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7559">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7560">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7561">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7561">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7563">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7563">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7564">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7564">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7565">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7565">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7566">생년월일 코드 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7566">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7567">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7567">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7568">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7568">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7569">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7569">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7570">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7571">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7571">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7572">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7573">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7573">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7574">정규식은 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7574">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7575">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7575">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7602">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7602">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7603">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7604">지정한 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7604">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7606">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7606">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7607">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7607">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7608">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7608">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7609">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7609">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7610">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7610">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7611">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7611">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7612">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7613">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7613">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7614">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7615">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7616">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7616">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7617">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7617">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
