## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7741">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7741">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7742">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7742">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7743">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7743">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7744">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7744">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7745">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7745">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7746">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7746">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7747">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7747">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7748">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7749">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7749">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7750">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7751">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7751">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7752">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7752">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7753">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7753">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7754">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7755">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7755">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7756">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7757">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7757">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7758">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7758">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7759">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7759">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7760">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7760">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7761">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7761">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7762">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7762">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7763">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7763">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7766">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7766">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7767">kodiċi personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7767">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7769">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7769">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7770">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7770">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7771">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7771">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7772">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7772">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7773">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7773">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7774">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7774">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7775">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7775">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7776">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7776">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7777">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7777">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7778">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7778">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7779">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7780">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7780">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7782">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7782">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7783">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7784">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7784">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7785">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7786">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7786">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7787">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7787">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7788">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7788">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7789">검색된 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7790">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7791">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7791">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7792">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7812">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7812">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7813">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7814">몰타 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7814">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7815">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7815">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7816">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7816">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7817">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7817">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7818">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7819">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7819">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7820">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7820">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7821">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7821">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7822">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7822">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7823">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7823">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7824">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7825">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7825">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7826">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7827">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7828">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7828">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7829">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7829">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7830">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7830">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7831">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7831">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7864">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7864">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7865">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7866">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7866">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7867">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7868">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7868">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7869">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7869">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7870">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7870">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7871">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7871">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7872">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7872">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7873">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7873">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7874">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7875">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7875">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7876">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7877">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7877">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7878">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7878">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7879">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7879">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7880">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7903">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7903">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7904">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7904">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7905">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7906">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7906">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7908">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7908">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7909">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7910">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-7911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-7912">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7913">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7913">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-7914">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-7914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8042">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8042">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8043">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8044">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8044">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8045">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8046">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8046">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8047">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8048">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8048">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8049">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8050">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8051">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8051">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8052">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8053">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8053">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8054">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8055">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8055">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8056">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8070">paspoort nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8070">paspoort nummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8074">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8074">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8075">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8075">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8076">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8076">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8077">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8077">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8078">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8078">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8079">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8079">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8080">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8080">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8081">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8082">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8082">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8083">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8084">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8084">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8085">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8086">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8086">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8088">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8088">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8089">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8089">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8090">키워드가  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8090">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8091">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8091">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8092">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8092">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8130">네덜란드 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8130">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8131">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8131">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8132">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8132">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8133">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8133">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8134">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8134">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8135">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8135">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8136">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8136">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8137">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8138">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8138">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8139">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8140">14자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8140">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8141">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8141">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8142">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8142">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8143">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8143">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8144">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8144">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8145">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8145">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8146">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8146">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8147">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8147">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8148">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8148">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8149">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8149">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8150">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8150">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8151">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8151">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8152">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8152">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8153">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8153">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8154">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8154">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8155">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8155">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8164">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8164">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8165">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8165">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8166">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8166">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8167">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8167">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8168">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8168">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8169">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8169">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8170">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8170">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8171">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8172">선택적 디지타이터를 통해 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8172">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8174">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8174">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8175">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8175">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8176">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8176">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8177">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8177">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8178">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8178">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8179">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8179">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8180">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8180">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8181">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8181">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8182">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8182">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8183">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8184">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8184">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8185">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8186">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8186">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8187">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8187">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8188">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8188">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8189">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8189">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8190">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8190">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8198">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8198">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8199">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8199">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8200">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8200">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8201">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8201">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8202">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8202">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8203">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8203">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8204">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8204">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8205">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8206">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8206">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8207">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8208">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8208">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8209">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8209">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8210">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8210">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8211">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8214">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8215">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8215">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8216">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8216">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8217">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8217">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8218">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8218">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8285">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8285">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8286">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8287">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8287">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8288">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8288">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8289">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8289">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8290">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8290">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8291">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8291">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8292">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8293">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8293">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8294">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8295">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8295">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8296">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8296">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8297">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8297">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8298">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8298">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8299">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8299">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8300">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8300">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8301">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8302">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8302">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8303">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8304">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8305">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8305">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8306">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8306">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8307">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8308">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8308">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8309">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8309">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8310">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8310">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8311">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8311">ird no.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8313">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8313">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8314">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8314">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8315">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8315">ird number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8317">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8317">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8318">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8319">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8319">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8320">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8321">'I'와 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8321">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8322">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8322">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8323">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8323">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8324">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8324">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8325">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8325">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8326">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8326">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8327">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8327">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8328">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8328">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8329">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8329">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8330">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8330">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8331">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8331">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8332">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8332">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8333">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8333">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8347">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8347">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8348">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8348">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8349">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8349">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8350">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8350">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8351">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8351">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8352">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8352">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8353">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8353">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8354">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8355">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8357">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8357">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8358">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8358">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8359">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8359">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8360">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8360">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8361">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8361">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8362">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8362">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8363">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8364">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8365">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8366">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8366">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8367">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8367">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8368">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8368">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8369">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8369">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8370">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8370">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8372">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8372">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8373">social social #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8373">social welfare #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8375">social social social no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8375">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8376">social social number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8376">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8377">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8377">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8378">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8378">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8379">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8380">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8380">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8381">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8382">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8382">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8383">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8383">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8384">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8384">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8385">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8385">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8386">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8387">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8389">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8389">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8390">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8390">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8391">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8391">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8392">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8392">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8393">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8393">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8394">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8394">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8395">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8404">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8404">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8405">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8405">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8406">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8406">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8407">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8407">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8408">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8408">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8409">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8409">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8410">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8410">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8411">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8411">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8412">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8412">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8413">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8413">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8414">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8415">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8416">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8417">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8417">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8418">정규식은 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8418">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8419">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8419">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8420">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8420">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8421">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8421">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8422">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8422">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8423">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8423">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8424">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8424">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8425">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8425">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8426">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8426">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8427">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8428">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8428">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8429">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8429">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8430">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8430">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8431">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8431">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8432">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8432">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8433">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8433">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8434">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8434">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8435">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8435">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8436">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8437">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8437">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8438">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8439">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8440">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8440">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8441">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8565">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8565">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8566">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8567">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8567">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8568">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8569">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8569">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8570">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8571">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8571">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8572">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8573">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8573">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8574">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8574">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8575">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8575">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8576">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8576">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8577">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8577">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8579">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8579">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8580">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8580">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8583">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8583">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8584">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8584">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8585">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8585">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8586">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8586">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8587">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8587">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8588">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8588">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8589">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8589">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8590">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8590">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8591">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8591">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8592">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8592">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8593">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8593">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8594">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8595">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8595">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8596">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8597">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8598">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8598">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8599">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8599">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8600">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8600">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8601">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8601">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8602">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8602">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8603">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8603">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
