## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8615">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8615">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8616">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8616">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8617">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8617">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8618">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8619">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8619">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8620">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8621">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8621">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8622">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8623">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8623">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8624">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8625">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8625">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8626">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8626">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8627">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8627">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8628">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8628">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8629">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8634">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8634">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8635">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8635">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8636">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8636">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8637">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8637">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8638">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8638">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8639">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8639">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8640">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8640">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8641">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8641">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8642">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8643">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8643">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8644">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8645">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8645">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8646">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8646">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8647">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8647">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8648">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8648">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8649">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8649">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8650">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8653">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8653">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8654">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8654">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8655">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8655">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8656">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8656">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8657">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8657">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8674">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8674">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8675">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8675">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8676">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8676">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8677">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8677">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8678">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8678">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8679">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8679">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8680">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8680">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8681">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8682">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8682">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8683">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8684">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8685">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8686">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8686">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8688">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8688">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8689">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8689">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8690">키워드가  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8690">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8691">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8692">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8692">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8693">nip #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8693">nip#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8694">nip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8694">nip</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8720">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8720">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8721">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8722">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8722">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8723">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8724">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8724">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8725">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8726">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8728">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8729">정규식은 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8729">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8730">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8730">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8750">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8750">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8751">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8752">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8752">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8754">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8754">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8755">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8755">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8756">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8756">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8757">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8757">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8758">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8758">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8759">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8759">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8760">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8760">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8761">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8761">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8762">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8762">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8763">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8763">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8764">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8764">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8765">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8765">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8766">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8767">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8769">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8770">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8770">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8771">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8903">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8903">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8904">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8905">문자 한 개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8905">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8906">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8907">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8907">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8908">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8908">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8909">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8909">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8910">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8911">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8913">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8913">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8914">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8914">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8915">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8916">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8916">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8917">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8917">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8918">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8918">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8919">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8919">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8946">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8946">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8947">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8948">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8948">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8949">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8949">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8950">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8950">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8951">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8951">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8952">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8952">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8953">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8953">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8954">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8954">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8955">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8956">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8956">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8957">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8958">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8959">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8959">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8960">키워드가  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8960">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8961">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8961">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8962">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8962">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8987">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8987">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8988">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8989">한 문자와 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8989">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8990">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8991">문자 1개와 숫자 8자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8991">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8992">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8992">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8993">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8993">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8994">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8995">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8995">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-8996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-8997">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8997">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8998">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8998">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-8999">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-8999">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9127">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9127">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9128">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9128">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9129">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9129">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9130">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9130">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9131">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9131">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9132">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9132">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9133">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9133">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9134">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9135">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9135">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9136">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9137">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9137">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9138">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9138">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9139">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9139">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9140">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9140">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9141">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9142">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9142">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9143">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9144">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9144">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9145">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9145">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9146">키워드가  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9146">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9147">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9148">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9148">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9199">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9199">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9200">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9201">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9201">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9203">8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9203">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9204">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9205">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9205">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9206">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9208">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9208">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9209">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9209">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9210">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9210">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9211">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9211">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9212">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9212">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9213">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9213">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9232">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9232">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9233">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9233">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9234">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9234">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9235">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9235">information governance</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9238">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9238">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9239">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9239">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9240">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9240">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9241">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9241">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9242">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9242">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9243">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9243">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9244">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9244">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9245">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9245">an optional space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9250">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9251">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9251">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9252">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9252">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9269">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9269">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9270">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9270">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9271">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9271">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9272">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9272">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9273">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9273">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9274">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9274">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9275">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9275">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9276">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9277">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9277">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9278">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9279">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9279">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9280">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9280">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9281">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9281">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9283">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9284">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9284">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9285">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9286">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9287">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9287">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9288">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9288">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9289">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9289">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_russia_passport_number_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9290">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9290">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9305">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9305">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9306">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9307">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9307">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9308">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9309">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9309">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9310">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9311">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9311">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9312">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9313">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9313">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9314">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9314">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9315">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9315">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9316">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9316">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9317">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9317">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9320">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9320">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9321">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9321">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9322">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9322">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9323">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9323">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9324">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9324">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9325">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9325">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9326">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9326">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9327">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9327">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9328">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9328">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9329">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9329">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9330">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9331">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9331">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9332">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9332">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9333">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9333">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9334">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9334">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9335">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_singapore_nric 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9335">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9336">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9336">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9337">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9338">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9338">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9339">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9339">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9350">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9350">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9351">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9352">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9352">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9353">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9354">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9354">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9355">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9355">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9356">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9356">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9357">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9358">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9358">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9359">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9360">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9360">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9361">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9361">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9362">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9488">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9488">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9489">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9489">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9490">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9490">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9491">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9491">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9492">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9492">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9493">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9493">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9494">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9494">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9495">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9496">선택적 백사시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9496">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9497">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9497">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9498">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9498">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9499">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9499">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9500">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9501">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9501">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9502">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9503">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9503">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9505">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9505">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9506">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9506">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9507">키워드가  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9507">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9508">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9509">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9509">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9556">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9556">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9557">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9558">1자리 숫자 또는 문자, 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9558">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9559">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9560">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ),7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9560">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9561">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9562">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9564">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9564">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9565">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9565">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9566">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9567">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9567">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9568">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9569">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9569">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9570">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9570">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9592">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9592">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9593">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9593">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9594">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9594">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9595">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9595">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9596">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9596">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9597">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9598">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9599">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9600">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9601">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9601">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9602">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9729">스로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9729">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9730">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9730">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9731">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9731">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9732">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9732">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9733">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9733">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9734">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9734">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9735">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9735">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9736">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9737">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9737">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9739">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9739">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9740">생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자입니다. 여기서 "LLL"은 생년월일의 마지막 세 자리 숫자에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9740">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9741">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9741">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9742">같은 날에 출산한 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9742">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9743">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9743">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9744">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9745">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9745">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9746">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9747">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9747">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9748">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9748">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9749">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9749">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9750">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9750">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9751">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9751">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9779">스로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9779">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9780">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9781">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9781">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9783">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9783">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9784">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9784">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9785">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9785">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9786">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9786">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9787">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9788">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9788">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9790">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9790">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9791">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9791">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9792">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9793">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9793">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9795">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9795">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9796">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9796">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9810">katevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9810">številka potnega lista</span></span>
