## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9819">스로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9819">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9820">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9820">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9821">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9821">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9822">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9822">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9823">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9823">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9824">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9824">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9825">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9825">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9826">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9827">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9827">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9828">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9828">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9829">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9829">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9830">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9830">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9831">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9831">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9832">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9833">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9834">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9835">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9835">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9836">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9836">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9837">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9837">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9838">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9838">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9839">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9839">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9863">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9863">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9864">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9865">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9865">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9867">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9867">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9868">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9868">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9869">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9869">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9870">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9870">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9871">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9871">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9872">체크 아웃 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9872">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9873">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9876">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9877">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9877">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9878">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9878">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9879">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9879">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9880">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9880">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9881">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9881">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9882">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9882">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9883">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9883">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9884">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9884">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9885">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9885">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9886">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9887">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9887">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9889">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9889">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9890">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9890">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9891">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9891">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9892">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9892">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9893">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9893">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9894">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9894">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9895">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9895">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9896">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9897">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9897">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9898">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9899">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9899">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9900">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9900">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9901">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9901">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9902">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9902">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9903">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9903">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9904">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9904">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9905">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9905">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9906">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9906">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9907">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9907">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9908">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9908">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9909">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9909">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9910">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9910">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9911">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9911">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9912">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9912">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9913">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9913">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9914">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9915">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9915">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9917">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9917">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9918">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9918">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9919">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9919">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9920">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9921">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9921">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-9922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9923">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9924">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9924">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9925">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9925">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-9926">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9926">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-9927">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-9927">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10061">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10061">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10062">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10062">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10063">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10063">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10064">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10064">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10065">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10065">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10066">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10066">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10067">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10067">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10068">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10069">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10069">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10070">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10071">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10071">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10072">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10072">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10073">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10073">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10074">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10074">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10075">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10076">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10076">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10077">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10078">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10078">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10079">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10079">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10080">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10080">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10081">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10082">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10082">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10102">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10102">personal identification number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10106">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10106">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10108">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10108">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10110">8-9자 또는 9자 조합 문자와 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10110">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10111">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10111">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10112">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10112">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10113">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10113">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10114">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10115">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10115">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10116">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10117">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10117">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10118">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10118">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10119">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10119">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10120">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10120">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10121">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10122">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10122">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10123">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10123">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10152">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10152">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10153">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10153">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10154">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10154">It's  available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10155">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10156">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10156">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10157">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10158">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10158">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10159">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10159">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10160">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10160">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10161">7~8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10161">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10162">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10162">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10163">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10163">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10164">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10165">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10166">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10167">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10167">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10168">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10168">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10169">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10170">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10170">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10171">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10171">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10172">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10172">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10173">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10174">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10175">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10176">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10177">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10178">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10179">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10180">지정된 패턴의 7-8자리 숫자와 1~2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10180">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10181">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10182">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10182">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10183">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10183">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10184">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10184">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10185">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10185">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10186">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10186">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10187">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10187">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10188">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10188">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10189">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10189">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10190">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10190">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10191">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10191">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10192">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10192">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10193">내국인 식별 번호가 있는 외신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10193">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10194">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10194">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10195">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10195">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10196">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10196">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10197">외신의 ID 번호가 없는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10197">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10198">"M"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10198">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10199">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10199">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10200">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10200">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10201">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10202">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10202">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10203">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10204">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10205">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10205">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10206">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10206">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10208">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10208">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10239">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10239">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10240">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10241">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10241">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10242">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10242">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10243">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10243">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10244">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10244">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10245">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" 여기서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10245">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10246">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10246">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10247">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미클론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10247">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10248">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 따오기 표시(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10248">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10249">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10249">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10250">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10251">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10251">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10253">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10253">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10254">정규식은 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10254">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10255">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10255">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10256">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10256">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10257">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10257">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10258">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10258">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10260">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10260">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10261">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10261">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10262">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10262">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10263">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10263">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10264">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10264">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10265">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10265">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10266">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10266">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10267">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10267">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10268">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10268">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10269">기호보다 작음(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10269">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10270">대/소문자, 자릿수, 상용구(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10270">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10271">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10271">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10272">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10272">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10273">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10273">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10278">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10278">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10279">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10279">localhost</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10281">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10281">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10282">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10282">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10283">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10283">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10284">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10284">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10285">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10285">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10286">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10287">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10287">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10288">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10289">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10289">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10290">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10290">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10291">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10291">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10292">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10292">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10293">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10294">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10294">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10296">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10296">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10297">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10297">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10298">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10298">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10432">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10433">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10433">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10434">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10435">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10435">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10436">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10436">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10437">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10437">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10438">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10438">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10439">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10439">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10440">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10441">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10441">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10442">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10443">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10443">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10444">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10444">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10445">검색된 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10445">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10446">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10446">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10447">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10447">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10448">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10448">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10449">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10449">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10465">personnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10465">personnummer#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10468">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10468">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10469">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10469">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10470">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10471">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10471">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10472">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10473">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10473">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10474">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10474">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10475">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10475">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10476">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10476">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10477">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10477">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10478">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10478">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10479">다음 중 하나는 true입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10479">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10480">검색된 Keyword_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10480">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10481">검색된 Keyword_sweden_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10481">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10512">스웨덴 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10512">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10513">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10513">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10514">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10515">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10515">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10517">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10517">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10518">생년월일에 해당하는 8자리 숫자(YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10518">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10519">일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자는 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10519">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10520">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성의 홀수 할당에 의해 성별을 나타내고 여성은 등수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10520">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10521">1990년 이전의 일련 번호 할당은 해당 번호의 원주민이 태어나는 시에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10521">Before 1990, the assignment of a serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10522">또는 1947년 1월 1일 세금 기록에 따라 거주했던(1947년 1월 1일 이전의 생년월일)에는 이민자에 대한 특수 코드(일반적으로 9번째 숫자)가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10522">Or (if born before 1947) where they had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the seventh digit) for immigrants.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10523">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10523">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10524">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10525">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10525">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10526">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10527">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10527">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10528">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10528">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10529">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10529">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10530">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10531">이  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10531">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10547">스웨덴 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10547">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10548">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10548">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10549">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10549">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10550">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10550">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10551">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10551">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10552">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10552">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10553">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10553">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10554">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10555">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10555">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10557">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10557">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10558">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10558">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10559">더하기 기호 또는 minus 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10559">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10560">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 3자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10560">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10561">1990년 이전 발급된 숫자의 경우 7-8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외세의 신생아를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10561">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10562">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성의 홀수 또는 심지어 여성으로 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10562">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10563">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10563">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10564">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10565">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10565">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10566">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10567">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10567">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10568">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10568">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10569">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10569">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10570">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10570">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10571">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10571">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10597">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10597">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10598">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10598">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10599">4개의 문자와 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10599">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10600">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10600">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10601">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10601">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10602">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10602">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10603">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10603">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10604">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10604">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10605">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10605">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10606">1~3자리 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10606">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10607">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10610">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10611">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10611">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10612">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10612">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10644">BIC 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10644">BIC 番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10645">BIC ೺</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10645">BIC コード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10646">金融機関識別コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10646">金融機関識別コード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10647">金融機関コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10647">金融機関コード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10648">銀行コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10648">銀行コード</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10649">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10649">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10650">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10650">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10651">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10651">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10652">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10652">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10653">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10653">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10654">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10654">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10655">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10655">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10656">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10656">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10657">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10657">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10658">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10658">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10659">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10659">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10660">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10660">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10661">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10661">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10662">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10662">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10663">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10663">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10664">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10664">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10665">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10665">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10666">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10666">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10667">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10668">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10670">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10670">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10671">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10671">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10672">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10672">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10673">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10674">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10674">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
