## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10695">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10695">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10696">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10697">한 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10697">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10698">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10699">한 문자(영어)와 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10699">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10700">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않는 영어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10700">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10701">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10701">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10702">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10702">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10703">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10704">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10706">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10707">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10707">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10708">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10708">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10709">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10710">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10710">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10711">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10711">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10712">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10712">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10714">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10714">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10717">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10717">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10718">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10718">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10719">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10719">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10720">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10720">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10721">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10721">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10722">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10722">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10723">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10723">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10724">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10724">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10725">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10725">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10726">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10726">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10727">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10727">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10728">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10728">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10729">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10729">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10730">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10730">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10731">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10731">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10732">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10732">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10733">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10733">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10734">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10734">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10735">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10735">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10736">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10736">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10737">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10737">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10738">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10738">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10739">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10740">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10740">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10741">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10742">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10742">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10743">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10743">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10744">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10744">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10745">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10745">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10746">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10746">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10747">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10747">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10748">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10748">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10749">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10749">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10750">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10750">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10751">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10751">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10752">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10752">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10753">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10753">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10754">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10754">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10755">대만 거주자 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10755">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10756">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10757">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10757">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10759">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10759">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10760">두 글자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10760">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10761">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10761">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10762">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10763">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10765">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10765">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10766">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10766">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10767">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10767">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10768">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10769">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10769">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10770">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10770">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10771">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10771">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10772">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10772">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10773">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10773">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10774">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10774">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10775">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10775">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10776">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10776">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10777">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10777">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10778">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10778">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10779">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10779">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10780">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10780">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10781">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10781">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10782">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10783">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10783">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10784">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10785">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10785">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10786">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10786">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10787">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10787">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10788">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10789">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10791">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10792">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10792">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10793">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10793">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10795">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10795">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10796">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10796">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10797">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10797">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10798">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10798">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10799">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10799">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10800">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10800">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10801">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10801">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10802">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10802">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10803">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10803">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10804">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10804">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10805">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10805">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10806">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10806">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10807">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10807">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10808">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10808">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10809">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10809">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10810">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10810">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10811">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10811">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10812">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10813">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10813">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10814">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10814">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10815">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10815">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10816">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10816">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10817">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10817">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10818">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10818">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10819">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10819">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10820">TC Kimlik numarasas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10820">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10821">바타르다얀크 누마라소드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10821">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10822">Vatandaandaandalandak no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10822">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10823">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10823">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10824">driver's license number(운전 면허 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10824">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10825">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10825">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10826">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10826">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10827">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10828">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10829">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10830">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10831">5자리 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10831">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10832">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10832">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10833">생년월일 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10833">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10834">드라이버가 여성인 경우 7번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 검사의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10834">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10835">대소문자 구분 안 2개 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10835">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10836">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10836">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10837">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10838">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10839">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10840">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10840">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10841">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10841">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10842">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10842">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10843">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10843">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10844">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10844">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10845">Keyword_uk_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10845">Keyword_uk_drivers_license</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10861">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10861">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10862">electoral roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10862">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10863">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10864">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10864">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10865">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10866">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10866">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10867">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10868">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10869">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10870">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10870">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10871">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10871">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10872">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10872">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10873">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10873">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10874">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10874">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10875">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10875">council nomination</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10877">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10877">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10878">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10878">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10879">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10879">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10880">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10880">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10881">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10882">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10882">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10884">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10884">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10885">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10885">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10886">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10886">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10887">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10887">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10888">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10888">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10889">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10889">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10890">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10891">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10892">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10893">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10894">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10894">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10895">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10895">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10896">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10897">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10898">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10898">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10899">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10917">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10917">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10918">NINO(national insurance number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10918">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10919">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10920">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10921">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10922">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10922">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10924">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10924">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10925">두 글자(유효한 NOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10925">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10926">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10926">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10927">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 되거나)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10927">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10928">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10928">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10929">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10929">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10930">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10931">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10932">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10933">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10934">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10935">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10935">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10936">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10936">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10937">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10937">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10938">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10939">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10939">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10940">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10941">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10942">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10942">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10943">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10943">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10944">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10944">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10945">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10945">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10947">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10947">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10948">national insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10948">national insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10949">national insurance contributions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10949">national insurance contributions</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10950">protection act</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10950">protection act</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10951">insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10951">insurance</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10967">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10967">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10968">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10968">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10969">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10969">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10970">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10970">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10971">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10971">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10972">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10972">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10973">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10973">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10974">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10974">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10975">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10976">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10976">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10977">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10978">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10978">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10979">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10980">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10980">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-10981">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-10982">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10983">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10983">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-10984">키워드가  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-10984">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11004">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11004">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11005">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11005">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11006">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11006">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11007">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11007">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11008">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11008">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11009">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11010">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11010">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11011">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11012">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11012">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11013">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11013">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11014">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11014">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11044">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11044">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11045">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11046">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11046">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11047">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11048">종속됩니다. 예를 들어 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11048">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11049">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11049">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11050">ddddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11050">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11051">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11052">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11052">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11053">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11054">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11055">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11055">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11056">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11056">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11057">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11057">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11058">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11058">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11059">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11059">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11060">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11060">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11061">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11061">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11062">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11062">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11160">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11160">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11161">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11162">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자(선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식 지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11162">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11163">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11164">형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11164">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11165">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11165">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11166">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11166">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11167">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11167">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11168">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11168">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11169">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11169">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11170">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11170">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11171">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11171">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11172">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11172">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11173">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11173">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11174">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11174">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11175">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11175">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11176">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11176">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11177">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11178">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11178">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11179">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11180">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11180">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11181">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11181">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11182">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11183">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11183">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11184">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11184">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11185">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11185">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11186">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11186">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11187">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11187">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11188">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11188">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11189">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11189">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11190">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11190">taxpayer</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11202">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11202">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11203">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11204">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11204">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11205">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강합니다. 여기서 숫자의 특정 부분이 유효한 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11205">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11206">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11207">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 봐야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11207">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11208">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11208">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자(ddddddd)로 서식이 지정되지 않은 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 포스터가 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11212">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11213">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11213">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11214">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11215">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11215">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11216">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11216">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11217">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11217">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11218">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11219">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11219">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11220">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11220">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11221">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11221">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11222">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11222">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11223">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11223">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11224">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11224">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11225">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11225">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11226">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11226">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11241">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11241">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11242">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11242">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11243">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11243">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11244">passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11244">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11245">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11245">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11246">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11247">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11247">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11248">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11249">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11249">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11250">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11251">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11251">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11253">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11253">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11254">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11254">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11255">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11255">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11276">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11276">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11277">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11277">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11278">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11278">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11279">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11279">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11280">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11280">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11281">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11281">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11282">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11282">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11283">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11284">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11285">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11286">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11286">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11287">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11288">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11288">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11289">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11290">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11291">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11291">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11292">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11292">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11301">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11301">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11302">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11303">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11304">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11305">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11306">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11307">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11308">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11309">8자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11309">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11310">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11311">8자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11311">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11312">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11312">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11313">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11313">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11314">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11315">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11315">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab497-11316">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab497-11317">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11317">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11318">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11318">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ab497-11319">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab497-11319">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
